Package org.fhnw.aigs.server.common

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIGSConsoleHandler
    This class is responsible for console input when the server is run in console mode.
    CustomFormatter
    Custom formatter for logging.
    LogRouter
    Class to manage the server-side logging.
    Main
    This is the Main class.
    ServerConfiguration
    Due to the fact that the class uses the Singleton Pattern, it is not possible to instantiate ClientCommunication directly.
    ServerShutdownCleanUp
    If the server shuts down, the ServerShutdownCleanUp.run() method of this class will send a ForceCloseMessage will be sent to all clients.
    ShowLogsAction
    Opens the log file folder.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LoggingLevel
    Enum to define the level of logging
    LoggingStyle
    Enum to define the Style of logging
    LoggingThreshold
    Enum to define the threshold of logging
